mapper.insert: insert into t_friend_request(req_main_user_id, req_sub_user_id, req_msg, req_code) values (#{mainId}, #{subId}, #{msg}, 0)
mapper.select: select req_id as reqId, req_main_user_id as reqMainId, req_sub_user_id as reqSubId, req_msg as reqMsg, req_code as reqCode from t_friend_request where req_main_user_id = #{mainId} and req_sub_user_id = #{subId}
